C

Card - Class in model
Card class to represent the cards in the memory game
Card(String, String) - Constructor for class model.Card
The constructor for Card.
cardClicked(int, int, int) - Method in class model.MemoryGame
Handles a card being clicked by revealing the card, adding the card to the array of revealed cards, creating an animation to flip cards back over if they don't match, and ending the game when appropriate.
changeMode(int) - Method in class model.Board
Changes game mode
checkMatch(Card) - Method in class model.Card
Checks if a card matches another
checkMatch(Card, Card) - Method in class model.Card
Checks if this card matches with two other cards.
checkMatch(Card, Card) - Method in class model.MemoryGame
Determines whether or not two cards match based on attribute values.
checkMatch(Card, Card, Card) - Method in class model.MemoryGame
Checks whether 3 cards match.
clear() - Method in class model.AccountCollection
This method clears the AccountCollection.
clear() - Method in class model.shopCollection
This method clears the shopCollection.
clearCanvas() - Method in class controller_view.BoardPane
This method clears the canvas before redrawing of a new game.
containsAccount(Accounts) - Method in class model.AccountCollection
This method returns whether or not the AccountCollection contains an equivalent account.
containsName(String) - Method in class model.AccountCollection
This method returns whether or not the AccountCollection contains an account with specified username.
